text:
Hi all, I'm trying to extract the odds of next matches for certain leagues. The code that I'm using to extract the matches (events) of next two weeks in German Bundesliga:
<https://gist.github.com/ivgomezarnedo/1220117c2236794dafe08534b6bc866b#file-scrap_bundesliga_matches-py>

For which I'm getting the expected result:
```{'Augsburg v Mainz': '2022-04-06 16:30:00', 'Stuttgart v Dortmund': '2022-04-08 18:30:00', 'Greuther Furth v Mgladbach': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'FC Koln v Mainz': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Bayern Munich v Augsburg': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Wolfsburg v Arminia Bielefeld': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Hertha Berlin v Union Berlin': '2022-04-09 16:30:00', 'Bochum v Leverkusen': '2022-04-10 13:30:00', 'Eintracht Frankfurt v Freiburg': '2022-04-10 15:30:00', 'RB Leipzig v Hoffenheim': '2022-04-10 17:30:00', 'Dortmund v Wolfsburg': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Augsburg v Hertha Berlin': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Freiburg v Bochum': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Mainz v Stuttgart': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Mgladbach v FC Koln': '2022-04-16 16:30:00', 'Arminia Bielefeld v Bayern Munich': '2022-04-17 13:30:00', 'Hoffenheim v Greuther Furth': '2022-04-17 15:30:00', 'Union Berlin v Eintracht Frankfurt': '2022-04-17 15:30:00', 'Leverkusen v RB Leipzig': '2022-04-17 17:30:00'}```
But if I try for other leagues like, for example, the Spanish Segunda Division, with the same code (changing the variable `competition_ids = [12204313]` ), the API is not returning any next matches although I'm able to see next matches using the Betfair webpage (See image). Any idea? Thanks in advance.

elements.text: Hi all, I'm trying to extract the odds of next matches for certain leagues. The code that I'm using to extract the matches (events) of next two weeks in German Bundesliga:
For which I'm getting the expected result:

{'Augsburg v Mainz': '2022-04-06 16:30:00', 'Stuttgart v Dortmund': '2022-04-08 18:30:00', 'Greuther Furth v Mgladbach': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'FC Koln v Mainz': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Bayern Munich v Augsburg': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Wolfsburg v Arminia Bielefeld': '2022-04-09 13:30:00', 'Hertha Berlin v Union Berlin': '2022-04-09 16:30:00', 'Bochum v Leverkusen': '2022-04-10 13:30:00', 'Eintracht Frankfurt v Freiburg': '2022-04-10 15:30:00', 'RB Leipzig v Hoffenheim': '2022-04-10 17:30:00', 'Dortmund v Wolfsburg': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Augsburg v Hertha Berlin': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Freiburg v Bochum': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Mainz v Stuttgart': '2022-04-16 13:30:00', 'Mgladbach v FC Koln': '2022-04-16 16:30:00', 'Arminia Bielefeld v Bayern Munich': '2022-04-17 13:30:00', 'Hoffenheim v Greuther Furth': '2022-04-17 15:30:00', 'Union Berlin v Eintracht Frankfurt': '2022-04-17 15:30:00', 'Leverkusen v RB Leipzig': '2022-04-17 17:30:00'}
But if I try for other leagues like, for example, the Spanish Segunda Division, with the same code (changing the variable
), the API is not returning any next matches although I'm able to see next matches using the Betfair webpage (See image). Any idea? Thanks in advance.

text: Only issue I had running your code on Bundesliga is there are too many markets (if  you include both RUNNER_METADATA and MARKET_DESCRIPTION in your projection then you can get a maximum of 100 markets in a single call)

elements.text: Only issue I had running your code on Bundesliga is there are too many markets (if  you include both RUNNER_METADATA and MARKET_DESCRIPTION in your projection then you can get a maximum of 100 markets in a single call)
